      Methods in com.example.gabriella.wanderlust with parameters of type DBUser 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SQLiteHelper.createTravel(DBTravel travel, DBUser user)
      Creates a row in the travel table with the given information about the travel and which user that has created it.
      void SQLiteHelper.createUser(DBUser user)
      Creates a user by adding information from an DBUser object to the database.
      void SQLiteHelper.createVisitedCountry(DBUser user, DBCountry country)
      Creates a row in the table user_country which shows the countries where the user has been by adding the user id and the country name to the table.
      void SQLiteHelper.deleteAllTravels(DBUser user)
      Deletes all travels which a user has created.
      void SQLiteHelper.deleteAllVisitedCountries(DBUser user)
      Deletes all the users visited countries, which is needed if the user is deleted from the database.
      void SQLiteHelper.deleteUser(DBUser user)
      Deletes a user by finding the row with the relevant user id.
      void SQLiteHelper.deleteVisitedCountry(DBUser user, DBCountry country)
      Deletes a row from the table user_country, which shows the countries where the user has been, by comparing the user id and the country name with the rows in the table.
      int SQLiteHelper.getTotalVisitedCountries(DBUser user)
      Method which returns the number of countries that the user has traveled to.
      DBTravel SQLiteHelper.getTravel(int travelID, DBUser user)
      Get data from database about a specific travel.
      java.util.List<DBTravel> SQLiteHelper.getTravels(DBUser user, android.content.Context context)
      Lists all the user's travels.
      java.util.List<DBCountry> SQLiteHelper.getVisitedCountries(DBUser user)
      Method which returns the whole list of the countries which the user has visited
      void SettingsActivity.update(DBUser updatedUser)
      This method updates the user information in the database.
      void SQLiteHelper.updateUser(DBUser user)
      Updates user information
